meanings.definition: Of or relating to an apparition.
meanings.sent1: The ghostly figure had an apparitional presence in the old mansion.
meanings.sent2: The eerie mist created an apparitional atmosphere in the graveyard.
meanings.sent3: The apparitional shadow seemed to play hide-and-seek with the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of him lingered like an apparitional presence in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The apparitional sound of footsteps echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an apparition.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious fog had an apparitional quality that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The apparitional figure vanished into thin air before our eyes.
meanings.sent3: The apparitional glow of the fireflies lit up the night like tiny lanterns.
meanings.sent4: His sudden appearance had an apparitional effect on the startled crowd.
meanings.sent5: The apparitional mist obscured the view of the distant mountains.
